DOC.brief_summary: This randomized trial is examining whether a treatment called cognitive remediation is more effective when it is paired with a social and functional skills training component.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Remediation and Functional Skills Training in Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of schizophrenia or schizoaffective disorder Enrolled in outpatient mental health care Reading level of 6th grade or higher English speaking Medical conditions known to affect cognition
